experience.title: Software Developer Intern
experience.description: Worked on backend development using Gin framework (Golang) and crafted CLI tools. Reduced latency by 12% by decoupling Azure and AWS services. Also learned that production code is like cooking - everyone has an opinion!

experience.title: Undergraduate Teaching Assistant
experience.description: Mentored 20 students in Optimization Techniques, conducted lab sessions, and provided academic guidance. Survived endless questions and debugging sessions. Learned that teaching is the best way to learn.
